languages.text:
Чей-то вскрик нарушил тонкое равновесие застывшего тела, и невесомость отпустила Лорд-капитана. {mf|Он|Она} провалил{mf|ся|ась} в бурую бездну клубящихся мороков, но теперь был{mf||а} способ{mf|ен|на} полностью управлять своим телом.
Теперь {name}...

traits.locale_text:
Чей-то вскрик нарушает тонкое равновесие застывшего тела, и Вольный Торговец вздрагивает — невесомость отпускает {mf|его|ее}. Словно камень, брошенный с обрыва, Лорд-капитан летит в бурую бездну клубящихся мороков, но теперь {mf|он|она} способ{mf|ен|на} полностью управлять своим телом.
Теперь Вольный Торговец...

languages.text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...
languages.original_text:
Чей-то вскрик нарушил тонкое равновесие застывшего тела, и невесомость отпустила Лорд-капитана. {mf|Он|Она} провалил{mf|ся|ась} в бурую бездну клубящихся мороков, но теперь был{mf||а} способ{mf|ен|на} полностью управлять своим телом.
Теперь {name}...

traits.locale_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's still body, and the weightlessness let go of {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

Then {name}...

Then {name}...

Then {name}...

Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

languages.text:
誰かの叫び声がロード・キャプテンの動かない身体の微妙な均衡を崩し、無が{mf|彼|彼女}を解放した。ロード・キャプテンは濁った幻影を持つ栗色の奈落へと真っ逆さまに落ちていったが、今度は身体の自由がきいた。
そして{name}は…
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text:
誰かの叫び声がロード・キャプテンの動かない身体の微妙な均衡を崩し、無が{mf|彼|彼女}を解放した。ロード・キャプテンは濁った幻影を持つ栗色の奈落へと真っ逆さまに落ちていったが、今度は身体の自由がきいた。
そして{name}は…

languages.text:
某个人的尖叫声打破了舰长大人静止的微妙平衡，失重的感觉突然消失了。{mf|他|她}坠入了红褐色的深渊，但已经完全恢复了对身体的掌控。
随后，{name}……
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text:
某个人的尖叫声打破了舰长大人静止的微妙平衡，失重的感觉突然消失了。{mf|他|她}坠入了红褐色的深渊，但已经完全恢复了对身体的掌控。
随后，{name}……

languages.text:
Un cri est soudainement venu rompre l'équilibre délicat dans lequel se trouvait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, dissipant toute sensation d'apesanteur et lui redonnant le contrôle de son corps, qui s'est retrouvé précipité dans les abysses rouge sombre d'illusions tourbillonnantes.
Alors, {name}...
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text:
Un cri est soudainement venu rompre l'équilibre délicat dans lequel se trouvait {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, dissipant toute sensation d'apesanteur et lui redonnant le contrôle de son corps, qui s'est retrouvé précipité dans les abysses rouges sombres d'illusions tourbillonnantes.
Alors, {name}...

languages.text:
Un grito interrumpió el precario equilibrio del cuerpo inmóvil {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, y la sensación de ingravidez {mf|lo|la} abandonó, {mf|precipitándolo|precipitándola} hacia el abismo granate de ilusiones arremolinadas; pero por fin había recuperado el control de su cuerpo.
Entonces {name}...
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text:
Un grito interrumpió el precario equilibrio del cuerpo inerte {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán, y la sensación de ingravidez le abandonó, {mf|precipitándolo|precipitándola} hacia el abismo granate de ilusiones arremolinadas; pero por fin había recuperado el control de su cuerpo.
Entonces {name}...

languages.text:
Jemandes Schrei zerstörte das delikate Gleichgewicht des reglosen Körpers des Lord Captains, und die Schwerelosigkeit gab ihn frei. Er stürzte in den kastanienbraunen Abgrund der wirbelnden Illusionen, hatte jedoch die volle Kontrolle über seinen Körper zurückerlangt.
Und {name} ...
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text:
Jemandes Schrei zerstörte das delikate Gleichgewicht des reglosen Körpers des Lord Captains, und die Schwerelosigkeit gab ihn frei. Er stürzte in den kastanienbraunen Abgrund der wirbelnden Illusionen, hatte jedoch die volle Kontrolle über seinen Körper zurückerlangt.
Und {name} ...

languages.text:
Birisinin çığlık atmasıyla Lord Kaptan'ın hareketsiz vücudunun hassas dengesi bozulup yeniden ağırlığa kavuştu. Lord Kaptan, aniden çalkantılı yanılsamaların bordo renkli hiçliğine düştü. Ancak bu kez, bir kez daha vücuduna tamamen hâkimdi.
Ardından {name}...
languages.original_text:
Someone's scream broke the delicate equilibrium of the Lord Captain's motionless body and the weightlessness released {mf|him|her}. {mf|He|She} plummeted into the maroon abyss of roiling illusions, but was now in full control of {mf|his|her} body again.
Then {name}...

traits.locale_text: Birisinin çığlık atmasıyla Lord Kaptan'ın hareketsiz vücudunun hassas dengesi bozulup yeniden ağırlığa kavuştu. Lord Kaptan, aniden çalkantılı yanılsamaların bordo renkli hiçliğine düştü ancak bu kez yeniden vücuduna tamamen hâkimdi. Ardından {name}...
